item.title: I need somebody who can ANIMATE a static Midjourney generated image into a perfect few second LOOP - Upwork
item.description:
I need somebody who can make an animated loop for the image attached. I need the avatar in the image to look like he is talking under his mask. Also some ambient animation of the clouds behind him moving, maybe rain (up to your creative mind) as well as steam coming up from his cup of coffee.

In summary, the most important thing is for the avatar to look like he is narrating and the ambient stuff behind him, I leave to you!

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 28, 2024 21:45 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:2D Animation, Animation, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Skills: 2D Animation, Animation, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Country: BGR

item.title: Looking For An Experienced YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
This is a LONG-TERM position with opportunity to Bonuses and/or Raises based on quality work and performance!
You’re responsible for creating engaging 8–10 minute videos 1-2 times weekly.
The channel will include content related to Lord of the Rings, Harry Potter and Game of Thrones.

Desired Skills:
• Good research for high quality clips and images. It helps if you are familiar with Game of Thrones, The Hobbit and Lord of the Rings.
• Good blending of clips, images and sounds to make audience feel emotionally connected watching
• Animating photos and images. Many times there isn't video footage and the images are not high quality therefore its useful if you are savy with using motion of pictures over a background to still give the feel of video.
• Being able to show movement or travel on maps. Many of the scripts will mention characters moving from one place to another.
• Good use of text
• Resourceful with the background music.
• Knowledge/experience in YouTube video editing and fair use.
• Being ambitious as we try to get 40% or higher of viewer engagement rate.
• Being passionate about the LOTR, GOT or HP is a plus!

Requirements:

1.  English expert
2. Professional software
3. 72H Or less turnaround time
4. Willing to work long term and grow with the team
5. If you are a fan of fantasy, apply!!
6. Understanding Youtube's copy right rules.

Please provide samples of previous work to be considered for the position!
Look forward to receiving your work.


Budget: $300
Posted On: June 28, 2024 21:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Animation
Skills: Audio Editing, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Animation
Country: Panama
click to apply

item.title: Make part of a still image have movement. Like flickering fire in a fire place. - Upwork
item.description:
Need to take a part of still image and add a moving piece. The images are going to be from a rendering.  We need to add some cool movement to the photos such as streaming TV’s or a flicker fire. (not sure how many photos yet) If this is something you can do please give me a price per photo.

Here are some examples:

item.title: Video Editor for Youtube Automation - Upwork
item.description:
💥We're seeking experienced Editor for Youtube Automation videos💥 (History Niche)

You have to have experience with Youtube automation videos and the Niche!🎥

This particular job also requires a bit of self-study.📖

We are seeking 1 or more (long term) Editors who are willing to do everything to get the best resultls!

Working in our team is seriously fun and you will be highly rewarder if you deliver good work!😉

You have to be content with weekly team calls.

Message me with info about your eperience and why you want to join the best Youtube automation team😁

Delive your best previous work in the Mystery niche!

The budget is flexible.

IMPORTANT: experience within the field is a must, examples are a must too. + experience with elevenlabs

item.title: YouTube Automation (FREELANCER - NO AGENCIES) needed for new YT channel - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone with experience in making UGC content. I will be providing the script and voiceover, and need someone to pull relevant footage related to the script. Some of the video footage can be provided, but you will need to find additional footage.

Please share some samples of YouTube channels you are currently working on & UGC videos

The topic of the channel will be obscure Wikipedia articles. The first video will be regarding the death of Mussolini. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Benito_Mussolini#Death
Some footage can be found on the wikipedia, however you will need to source more footage, and match the script to the video

Please only apply if you have experience making UGC content, and are not an agency.

If you have read the entire post, please start your proposal with: "I am not an agency"

* I will hire 3-4 freelancers to create a 1 minute sample video and based on that will chose who to hire for the channel * IF successful, this could become a long term relationship.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 28, 2024 21:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Data Entry, YouTube Marketing
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Data Entry, YouTube Marketing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Adobe After Effects Specialist Needed for Logo Tracking and Replacement in Exercise Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Motion Tracking: Accurately track the movement of the chest area through various exercise motions.

Logo Placement: Add a logo to the center chest area of the shirt.

Occlusion Handling: Ensure the logo is correctly occluded when arms cover the chest during exercises.

Template Creation: Develop a reusable template for different logos to be added in the future.

Proficiency in Adobe After Effects, especially in motion tracking and masking.

Experience with handling occlusions and complex movements in video.

Ability to create a script or template for easy logo replacement in the future.

Attention to detail and a good eye for seamless integration of graphics in video.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 21:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Digital Video, Adobe Creative Cloud, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Digital Video, Adobe Creative Cloud, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor needed to fix audio-video sync issue - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can help us fix the audio-video sync issue in our loom video. The current audio does not match the video properly, and we need someone with experience in video editing to synchronize them perfectly. The editor should be able to adjust the timing, cut or add frames if necessary, and ensure a seamless audio-video experience for the viewers. This project requires attention to detail and a good understanding of video editing software.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Audio synchronization
- Attention to detail
- Familiarity with video editing software

This is a small project that can be completed within a few days, depending on the complexity of the video. We are looking for someone who can start immediately and deliver high-quality results within the given timeframe.


Posted On: June 28, 2024 21:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a creative and talented individual to join our team as a Social Media Content Creator. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating high-quality posts and videos that align with our brand image. This is a long-term position, offering consistent work and growth opportunities.

Responsibilities:
- Develop engaging and visually appealing social media posts
- Create compelling video content that grabs the attention of our target audience
- Collaborate with the marketing team to understand campaign objectives and deliverables
- Ensure all content is aligned with brand guidelines

Requirements:
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong ability to create eye-catching visuals
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills
- Knowledge of current social media trends and best practices

Join our team and help us take our social media presence to the next level!

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 28, 2024 21:17 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Facebook
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Facebook
Country: India
click to apply
